content: Why do I feel so numb, is it something to do with where I come from? Should this be fight or flight? I don't know why I'm constantly so uptight. Rapid heartbeat pounding through my chest, agitated body in distress. I feel like I'm in danger, daily life is strangled by my stress. A stifling surge shooting through all my veins, extreme apprehension, suddenly I'm insane. Lost all hope for redemption. A grave situation, desperate at best.
author: Dream Theater
